title: 148863540.complication Is Easy
excerpt: There are endless ways to complicate your life. And it’s incredible easy to do.

children.text: There are endless ways to complicate your life. And it’s incredible easy to do.
Because, of course, when you run out of space, you can simply pay for more.
More storage, more room, more convenience. Stockpiling ad infinitum.
It’s a lot more difficult to make do with less. To say this is enough. To rid yourself of things you don’t need or use, while holding on to things that are merely purposeful or useful.

It’s not easy to set a limit on the margins from which you can consume. But it is economical. It is worth it. And—in making you less hampered and confined—it is a powerful way to live lightly, to raise your productivity, and to traverse freely.
Bringing ease and clarity to life—by simplifying everything in it.
